name: Do You Copy? (Robin)
description:
A cleaned up version of 'Do You Copy?'

Use the arrow keys to create a sequence of movements for the walkie talkie on the left to follow, the one on the right will listen out and try and copy!

20 levels (so far!)

Code, Art & Design - Robin

Music & SFX (composer) - yasmine latkowski  https://twitter.com/yasminelatkowsk
